I.R: Uploaded to server when Added or Changed, supports Undo
Saved to cookies, to not load it, set <Cfg FilterLap=’1’ />

I.S: Range or more values in one cell
Range or more values in one cell

I.R: Calculates the sample variance of column
Calculates the sample variance of column. column is the selection of data.
Saved to cookies, avoid it by <C VisibleLap=’1’/>
Saved to cookies, to avoid it, set <Pager VisibleLap=’1’/>
Saved to cookies, avoid it by <C WidthLap=’1’/>
Saved to cookies, to avoid it, set <Pager WidthLap=’1’/>

I.D: Postfix to data source and prefix to parameter name (e.g. Data_Param_Test)
Attached to OnDragGanttHeader event, can be attached also to OnDragGantt
(Date start, Date end, int width = null)
